item.title: Derivation of some definite integrals
item.description: arXiv:2412.10395v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this work derivations of definite integrals listed in Prudnikov volume I, Gradshteyn and Ryzhik and a few other tables are produced. Special cases of these integrals in terms of fundamental constants are also evaluated. The method used in these derivations is contour integration.
item.dc:creator: Robert Reynolds
